author: Simon Difford
description: This creamy orange cocktail screams for a funky and characterful rum that needs taming - it's just not the same with a more restrained rum. And, depending on your orange curaçao and personal tastes, you may want to add a touch of additional sugar to the classic three equal parts recipe.
name: Parisian Blonde
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
